item.title: Will some1 actually help me
item.dc:creator: @fatcat2248 fatcat2248
item.description:
@fatcat2248 wrote:

The System can not find path sepificed…

DIDNT YOU READ THE FAQ!!!
Error1:
The path is not specified.Answer: This means that you have to set the paths. First download java at www.java.com
Then open up My Computer.

Click System Information

Click the Advanced Tab

Click Enviromental Variables

Click New at the top

Then for variable Name put CLASSPATH and for the path put CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.
Now click Ok and click New one more time put as the variable name Path and the path put C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin

Now you should be able to runserver and compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Will some1 actually help me
item.dc:creator: @Lamez Lamez
item.description:
@Lamez wrote:

here use mine, I hatethe perfect compiler one,

[code]
@ECHO OFf

REM ---------------------------------------------------
REM Made By Lamez, Please to not edit or copy any
REM thing without permission from Lamez (James Little)
REM Please Visit http://krazyscape.lamezz.com
REM ---------------------------------------------------
REM This will Compile and Run your server at option
REM ---------------------------------------------------

:start
color a
cls
TITLE Do You Want To Compile? - Made By Lamez
ECHO [Y]es or [N]o
ECHO.
SET/p do=Do You Want To Compile Before Run?:^>

if “%do%” equ “y” goto comp
if “%do%” equ “Y” goto comp
if “%do%” equ “n” goto server
if “%do%” equ “N” goto server
if “%do%” equ “” goto error

ECHO.

:error
color c
cls
ECHO.
title ERROR! - Made By Lamez
ECHO %do%, is not a command!
ECHO.
ECHO Please Enter: Y or N
ECHO.
ECHO Press Any Key To Continue!
PAUSE>NUL
GOTO start

:comp
cls
ECHO.
TITLE Compiler - Made By Lamez
color a
“%homedirve%\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“%homedirve%\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe” server

pause

:server
Title Running Server - Made By Lamez
cls
java -Xmx1024m -splash:splash.jpg -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server 4545
pause[/code]

++rep if I helped!
